description: Provides data on Members' Subscriptions and Contributions. Latest information on voting powers is available at http://go.worldbank.org/VKVDQDUC10. Prior to effectiveness, only a portion of the value Instruments of Commitment (IoCs) received as specified in the replenishment resolution is recorded as Subscriptions and Contributions committed. Upon effectiveness, the received is subsequently recorded as subscriptions and contributions committed remainder of the value of IoCs.

name: IDA Statement of Voting Power and Subscriptions and Contributions
